dcterms:creator: M. Lataifeh
A. Elnagar
dcterms:description: A large dataset of Arabic-based audio clips containing 15810 clips of 30 popular reciters reading 37 chapters from the Holy Quran, along with 397 audio clips for 12 imitators of the top reciters and two plain text files containing the same chapters' textual content read by the reciters with and without vocalization.
dcterms:title: Ar-DAD
